channel.title: Posts on Quantum Protocol Zoo's Repository
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Quantum Protocol Zoo's Repository

item.title: Resources visualization
item.description: When new physical capacbilities are built, new protocols are de facto available for implementations. To discover protocols and functionalities availables for a given set of resources, just click on them on the Quantum Protocol Zoo Knowledge Graph. Protocols will be highlighted when they can be implemented using the selected resources.

item.title: Quantum Protocol Zoo's Repository
item.description: What will you find here? The Quantum Protocol Zoo aims at providing an oerview of selected quantum communication protocols arranged into functionalities, protocols per se and resources needed to implement them. This repo is tightly integrated with the zoo as it contains simulaQron code for implementing these protocols using quantum optics devices or simulators.
